title: Best of 2018: America's Greediest Holiday
description:
Originally aired 11/22/2018
Like turkey, mashed potatoes and football, shopping is now ingrained as part of the American Thanksgiving tradition. And this year, holiday shoppers are expected to make this season one of the most profitable in history for retailers. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Anne Riley Moffat on just how big Black Friday could be and how it got its start. 
FOLLOW UP
 Bloomberg's latest report: America's Online Spending Surge Portends Blowout Black Friday
You can follow Anne at: @A_Riley17
